game.name: Noble Fates
game.genres: Action, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Harness your Demigod powers to lead a group from rags to riches in this 3D Fantasy Kingdom Management Sim with RPG elements. Command from the sky or take control in 3rd Person to BUILD, BATTLE, and RULE. Navigate a world of interesting Nobles, earn their respect, and decide their Fates.

reviewHighlights.text: Life before death. Strength before weakness. Gameplay before graphics.
I will leave a detailed Review in the future, but for now: yes, it's a pretty good game with unique and enjoyable gameplay. You should give it a try.
